boat.name: Sarah Grace
boat.full_description:
Her shallow draft with stub bilge keels is ideal for investigating creeks and rivers, but she is just as happy on coastal waters.

The absence of a centreboard makes her surprisingly roomy for her size and she can easily take 4 in comfort.

Sarah Grace is kept in a dry barn on her trailer so she is ready to go within a few minutes. Her unstayed mast and single loose footed lugsail means she can be rigged within seconds either on the trailer at the slip or on the water.

Her auxilliary power is a 2.5hp Honda outboard.

These are super little day boats and are renowned for their seakeeping abilities
boat.short_description: Sarah Grace is a Drascombe Scaffie with a loose footed lugsail.
